fullText: Craig and Weisz are both terrific, bringing a lived-in quality to their roles that makes the pain feel real.
dtliExcerpt: Craig and Weisz are both terrific, bringing a lived-in quality to their roles that makes the pain feel real.
bwwExcerpt: At the end, which is the beginning, Jerry is carefree and daring. We already know a decade of lies and cheating awaits. This is the kind of insight that makes "Betrayal" a play worth revisiting - its very structure encourages multiple viewings. Just not at $500 a pop.
